review: The only reason this isn't rated a 5 star is due to the voice command only working with prime.Anything non-Amazon you are using the remote hunting and clicking. A merger or a software change or add on would fix this.The other issue is with how different movies are released. It is Amazon not the Fire TV though the device works great.The only issue with the remote is that you can't slave your TV remote to turn the power on and control the volume of the TV. Other than that it works great. This might be fixed with a universal remote but I haven't tried and don't care to mess with it yet.
